ModMetaData.name: RoomTempDisplay
ModMetaData.author: hawqeye19
ModMetaData.description:
Displays each room's temperature directly on the map, helping you monitor heating and cooling at a glance.
- Small wall-adjacent labels when the temperature overlay is off. - Large centered labels when the in-game temperature overlay is on. - Optional color gradients for cold, comfortable, and hot ranges. - Settings menu to adjust comfort thresholds and gradient behavior. - Toggle display with a Play Settings button (checkmark indicates active). - Only shows for proper, fully roofed rooms (ignores doorways and outdoor spaces). - Labels automatically update when room shapes change.
Requires Harmony.
